alert.note: Alert for Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Polk County through 700 PM CDT... At 627 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stromsburg, or 18 miles north of York, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stromsburg around 635 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Osceola and Shelby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
